includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of misfit students come together to join their high school show choir, led by idealistic teacher Will Schuester. Snappy musical comedy drama starring Lea Michele.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of misfit students come together to join their high school show choir, led by idealistic teacher Will Schuester. Snappy musical comedy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A group of misfit students come together to join their high school show choir, led by idealistic teacher Will Schuester. Snappy musical comedy drama starring Lea Michele.

includedAssets.title: Showmance
includedAssets.synopsis: Sue Sylvester plants three of her cheerleaders into the glee club to bring them down from the inside, while Terri gets a shock regarding her pregnancy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sue Sylvester plants cheerleaders into the glee club to bring them down from the inside, while Terri gets a shock regarding her pregnancy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sue Sylvester plants three of her cheerleaders into the glee club to bring them down from the inside, while Terri gets a shock regarding her pregnancy.

includedAssets.title: Acafellas
includedAssets.synopsis: Will takes a break from New Directions to perform in an all-male a capella group. Meanwhile, Kurt upsets Mercedes with a revelation. Josh Groban guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Preggers
includedAssets.synopsis: Kurt becomes an unexpected addition to the football team, and decides to come out to his father, while Quinn has big news for Finn.

includedAssets.title: The Rhodes Not Taken
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - The Rhodes Not Taken
includedAssets.synopsis: Will recruits ex-glee club member April Rhodes (Kristin Chenoweth) to fill the spare spot in New Directions, but she proves to be a bit of a bad influence.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Will recruits ex-glee club member April Rhodes to fill the spare spot in New Directions, but she proves to be a bit of a bad influence.

includedAssets.title: Vitiman D
includedAssets.synopsis: When Will pits the guys against the girls, new school nurse Terri offers them a little something to pep up their performances - with disastrous results.

includedAssets.title: Throwdown
includedAssets.synopsis: Will clashes fiercely with his new co-director Sue, while the kids rally around Quinn when her pregnancy becomes the talk of the school.

includedAssets.title: Mash-Up
includedAssets.synopsis: Finn and Quinn are horrified to realise that joining the glee club has cost them their popularity, Puck and Rachel date and Sue is romanced by a local news anchor.

includedAssets.title: Wheels
includedAssets.synopsis: Kurt and Rachel compete to perform a solo of Defying Gravity, Will questions the motives behind Sue's latest cheerleading recruit and Artie and Tina go on a date.

includedAssets.title: Ballad
includedAssets.synopsis: The kids are paired up to sing ballads to one another, leading Rachel to develop a crush on Will. Finn and Quinn's parents find out about the baby.

includedAssets.title: Hell-O
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel and Finn and Emma and Will endure bumpy starts to their new relationships as Vocal Adrenaline cause a stir. Idina Menzel and Jonathan Groff guest star.

includedAssets.title: The Power of Madonna
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep15 - The Power of Madonna
includedAssets.synopsis: As the glee club pay tribute to the `Queen of Pop', Jesse St James joins New Directions and Emma, Rachel and Finn consider losing their virginities.

includedAssets.title: Home
includedAssets.synopsis: Kurt sets his dad up on a date with Finn's mum, Will reconnects with April, and Sue causes Mercedes to worry about her weight. Guest starring Kristin Chenoweth.

includedAssets.synopsis: A mysterious list of the New Directions' sexual exploits spreads throughout the school, while Sue is mortified when an embarrassing old video of her surfaces.

includedAssets.title: Laryngitis
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel gets tonsillitis, leading her to wonder who she would be without her stunning singing voice, while Kurt tries to prove his masculinity to his dad.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The talented William McKinley High School glee club, New Directions, attempt to compete on the highly competitive show choir circuit, while dealing with social issues and learning to work as a team. Musical-comedy-drama fun starring Lea Michele, Cory Monteith and Jane Lynch.
